LanguageData.PlantDandelion.label: dandelions
LanguageData.PlantDandelion.description: A common small flower. Though it is often considered a weed, it is pleasant to look at.
LanguageData.PlantRose.label: rose
LanguageData.PlantRose.description: A beautiful cultivated flower, symbolic of love and romance since ancient times.
LanguageData.PlantDaylily.label: daylily
LanguageData.PlantDaylily.description: A beautiful cultivated flower - great for brightening up a drab yard. Must be replanted often.
LanguageData.PlantAlliumGiganteum.label: allium giganteum
LanguageData.PlantAlliumGiganteum.description: A beautiful cultivated flower, dark purple bulb.
LanguageData.PlantAnthurium.label: anthurium
LanguageData.PlantNymphHair.label: NymphHair
LanguageData.PlantPinkRimstalk.label: PinkRimstalk
LanguageData.PlantPinkRimstalk.description: A beautiful cultivated long stemmed pink flower.
LanguageData.PlantPlumeria.label: Plumeria
LanguageData.PlantPlumeria.description: A beautiful cultivated small bushy flower that grows in random colors.
LanguageData.PlantSunflower.label: Sunflower
LanguageData.PlantSunflower.description: A beautiful tall growing bright yellow flower.
